name: Spiritville
description:
While waiting for the game to load, try reading this:

To access the farmlands, simply go south.

Controls:

WASD to move. Left-click to use a tool. Use the scroll-wheel to zoom in/out.

To adjust viewport size, zoom in/out via the browser.

To add emotional depth to the character, press "Shift + S".

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/oHX8WbEs3WGwpqEs6

Note:

There are 5 gifts in total, each house can only contain ONE instance of each gift. Therefore the game will not let you buy a gift if that gift has been equipped on all 4 houses.

How to play: 

Earn money by farming, use the money to buy gifts from the shop.

To gift once a gift is bought: walk up to a house with a present and left-click when the present locks onto a mailbox.

Credits:

Main Character Art: https://cathan12.artstation.com/projects/809NQ
Main Art by Cup Nooble (Sprout Lands- UI and Asset Pack), and World of Solaria: Rural Village tileset.
Scythe Art: https://www.seekpng.com/ipng/u2q8y3o0u2t4t4e6_scythe-pixel-art/
Music by Chris Logsdon from the Fantasy Towns Music Pack on itch.io

SFX by random youtube videos.
